thread.title: Kristine Elkins
thread.title_full: France Off the Beaten Path reviewed by Kristine Elkins

author: Kristine Elkins
title: Kristine Elkins
text: One of the best vacations I have ever taken! Great food, incredible tours of gorgeous Provence, and the tour guides are amazing - charming, funny, and infinitely knowledgable. My husband and I remain friends with two of the couples we met there. I would do it again in a heartbeat.
